string-array.name: workout_description
string-array.item: Lay in a hand plank position with your hands and feet shoulder width apart. Push up until your arms are fully extended then lower yourself back into a plank position.
Lay on your back on a flat a bench and hold a weighted bar above you chest level grip the bar with your hands at shoulder width, lower the bar till ti touches your chest and push back up
Grab the bar with palms facing away from you, another person can assist you by holding your ankles while you perform the exercise.

Stand with legs about shoulder width. Hold the bar or weighted bar along your upper chest/shoulder area. explosively push the weight into the air and extend your arms, as you push the bar jump and bring your legs into a staggered position. bring it back down to your chest and repeat.
